item.description:
Hello all!

For our next Meetup, Emma is going to host a birthday party for Windsor, who turns one in July! Emma will have coffee and bagels for us humans and some favors for the doggies. :)

This Meetup will be limited to 12 humans, so I won't allow maybes. I am only allowing 1 guest so if you are bringing a guest (preferably someone who normally attends our meetups), please add 1 to your RSVP.

Also, if your plans change after you RSVP, please change your RSVP accordingly as soon as possible.

Hope to see you there!
Laura & Molly,
Emma & Windsor

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel July Meetup
